mapper.select: select o.ORDER_ID as orderId, s.SHOP_NAME as shopName, o.PRICE as orderPrice, o.EAT_POINT as eatPoint, o.GOODS_COUNT as orderGoodsCount, o.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, o.CREATE_TIME as createTime from `order` o join shop s on s.SHOP_ID = o.SHOP_ID join order_ext oe on oe.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID where o.USER_ID = #{userId} order by o.CREATE_TIME desc
